column5: Come enjoy my super trendy, modern, newly renovated two bedroom/1.5 bathroom townhouse. We have put a lot of love into my townhome and plan on taking excellent care of you.  We want your stay to be as comfortable as possible, while offering you the feel of a Austin or New York Hotel.  The Townhouse has been equipped with all the latest technology; High Speed WiFi, AppleTV, Chromecast, Roku, Samsung Smart TV's, charging stations for both micro USB and lighting in every room.
column8: Trendy Luxurious 2 BR Townhouse / Near Ft. Hood
